main.aboutusdesc: General Store ndiye malo ogulitsira m'masitolo onse a General Store padziko lonse lapansi omwe amagulitsa mwapadera mitundu yodziwika bwino.
main.subscribedesc: Chonde lowetsani imelo ngati mukufuna kulandira nkhani zaposachedwa kuchokera kwa ife.

title: Perekani Kutali %s
subtitle: Lowani tsopano kuti mupeze mwayi wopambana %s!

section1.sDesc1: Pano pali pomwe mungapeze kuti ambiri amapereka zabwino, zosavuta kujowina, zopatsa zabwino kwambiri ndi maubwino ena osiyanasiyana

banner1.bDesc1: Ngati mwalembetsa, onani imelo yanu nthawi ndi nthawi kuti mumve zambiri kuchokera kwa ife. Tiperekanso ma vocha ogulira m'sitolo yathu kwaulere. Mukuyembekezera chiyani! Yambitsani

section2.sDesc2: Sankhani mphatso yomwe mumakonda, mutha kutenga nawo mbali pazopereka zonse pamndandanda womwe timapereka pansipa.

banner2.bDesc2: Pongolembetsa nokha mutha kutenga nawo mbali pazopereka zathu. Mukuyembekezera chiyani! tiyeni Tilembetseni pompano.

section3.sDesc3: Pezani Free GiveAway pasanathe maola 24! Musaphonye mwayi wosowawu, ndizosavuta, ingolembetsani patsamba lathu ndikuwayesa (ngati alipo), simuyenera kulipira chilichonse. Zabwino zonse!

step1.ssDesc11: Kuti mupeze mwayi wopambana %s, zonse muyenera kuchita ndikulemba fomu yolembetsera akaunti yanu. Kuti muyambe, ingolowani mpikisano ndi imelo adilesi yanu.

step2.ssDesc21: Mukangolowa, mudzakhala ndi mwayi wolowetsamo zina polemba zochitika zosiyanasiyana, kuphatikizapo kuyendera mayendedwe athu ochezera.
step2.ssDesc22: Muli ndi ufulu womaliza kuchita zochuluka momwe mungafunire, chilichonse chomwe mungachite chimapereka zolemba zingapo ndipo cholowa chilichonse chimakhala chopambana.

step3.ssDesc31: Wachita. Tidzakulankhulani nthawi yomweyo kutengera kulumikizana komwe kudadzazidwa nthawi yolembetsa patsamba lathu.

banner3.bDesc3: Mwambowu umapereka mipata yopambana kuposa chaka chatha. Itanani anzanu ndi abale anu kuti adzakhale ndi mwayi wokulirapo. Lembetsani tsopano mwambowu usanayambe.

theWinner.coment1: Zikomo chifukwa cha Cash, ndikhulupilira kuti sitolo yanu idzadzaza.
theWinner.coment2: Ichi ndi shopu yotchuka ya GeneralStore, phukusili lidayenda bwino ndidalandira, Zogulitsa ndizoyambirira, ndipo sindimalipira. Zikomo.
theWinner.coment3: Poyamba sindinakhulupirire, koma nditawafotokozera, zidapezeka kuti inali GeneralStore. zikomo GeneralStore chifukwa cha %s.
theWinner.coment4: Zikomo mulungu chifukwa chowonjezera mwayi wanga, zikomo popereka mphatso, GeneralStore ndimachikonda.

section5.sTitleBefore5: Kuyenda bwino kwa zochitika zathu & bizinesi
section5.sDesc5: Tikuthokoza chifukwa chothandizidwa kwathunthu chomwe chimatithandiza nthawi zonse
section5.dSupport1: Kampani yaku America yamakampani opanga ukadaulo ku Seattle, Washington, yomwe imayang'ana kwambiri za e-commerce, cloud computing, digito, komanso luntha lochita kupanga.
section5.dSupport2: Wogulitsa intaneti waku America wogulitsa makamaka mipando yomwe ili ku Midvale, Utah, pafupi ndi Salt Lake City. Patrick M. Byrne adakhazikitsa Overstock.com mu 1999.
section5.dSupport3: Makampani ogulitsa ku America ochokera kumayiko osiyanasiyana omwe amagulitsa ma hypermarket angapo, malo ogulitsira otsika mtengo, komanso malo ogulitsa kuchokera ku United States, omwe amakhala ku Bentonville, Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: Wogulitsa zamagetsi amitundu yambiri aku America omwe amakhala ku Richfield, Minnesota. Idakhazikitsidwa koyambirira ndi Richard M. Schulze ndi James Wheeler ku 1966 ngati malo ogulitsira nyimbo otchedwa Sound of Music.
section5.dSupport5: Ntchito yogulitsa pa intaneti yochokera ku China yomwe ili ndi Alibaba Group. Chokhazikitsidwa mu 2010, chimapangidwa ndi mabizinesi ang'onoang'ono ku China ndi madera ena, monga Singapore, omwe amapereka zogulitsa kwaogula pa intaneti padziko lonse lapansi.
section5.dSupport6: American multinational e-commerce corporation yomwe ili ku San Jose, California, yomwe imathandizira kugulitsa kwa ogula ndi ogula komanso ogulitsa ndi ogulitsa kudzera patsamba lawo.

section6.sDesc6: Ngati muli ndi mafunso okhudzana ndi malonda, kapena chilichonse chomwe mukufuna, chonde musazengereze kuti mutitumizire.
section6.subject: Mutu
